arts.ttl: Opening day delight for Sandro Wagner as clinical Augsburg stun Freiburg on the road
arts.sum: Augsburg kicked their season off with a ruthless display to down Freiburg 3-1 on the road to claim their first three points of the new Sandro Wagner era with goals from Dimitrios Giannoulis, Chrislain Matsima and Marius Wolf making for a rampant first half performance. The hosts continued to dominate possession but were caught out against the run of play in the 32nd minute when Dimitrios Giannoulis fired Augsburg ahead, his shot taking a crucial deflection off Lukas Kübler to wrong-foot Noah Atubolu .

arts.ttl: The Wagner effect! - Augsburg stun Freiburg on matchday 1
arts.sum: The new Bundesliga season opened with a surprise in the Black Forest, as FC Augsburg defeated SC Freiburg 3–1 at the Europa-Park Stadion.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: SC Freiburg vs. FC Augsburg
arts.sum: The Bundesliga is back! Freiburg are kicking off their 2025/26 Bundesliga season at home against Sandro Wagner's FC Augsburg - who will come out on top? Here are the confirmed lineups of both teams.

arts.ttl: SC Freiburg vs. Augsburg preview: Freiburg look to build on strong campaign
arts.sum: After securing Europa League football under Julian Schuster last term, Freiburg are looking to start strongly once again, as they face an Augsburg side now under the guidance of Sandro Wagner.
